RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui graduaчуo em Engenharia Eletrєnica - Telecomunicaчѕes pela Universidade de Sуo Paulo - Escola Politщcnica da USP (1979), Especializaчуo em Testes Sistъmicos de Satщlites pelo Communication Research Center Canada(1987) e Integraчуo e Testes de Satщlites pela Hughes Communication International (Boeing Aerospace) Los Angeles(1992), e Doutorado em Engenharia Aeronсutica e Mecтnica pelo Instituto Tecnolѓgico de Aeronсtica - ITA (2011). Atualmente щ Tecnologista senior do Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas Espaciais(INPE) - Gerente da Garantia da Qualidade da Montagem, Integraчуo e Testes (AIT) de satщlites do Laboratѓrio de Integraчуo e Testes (LIT). Atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: Desenvolvimento integrado de sistemas espaciais, Projeto e Desenvolvimento de Satщlites, Montagem, Integraчуo e Testes(AIT) de satщlites em nэvel de sistema e Garantia da Qualidade para AIT.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Graduated in Electronic Engineering - Telecommunications from the University of Sуo Paulo - USP Polytechnic School (1979), Specialization in Satellite System Tests - Communication Research Centre - Canada (1987), and Satellite Integration and Testing -Hughes Communication International (Boeing Aerospace) - Los Angeles (1992), and Ph.D. in Mechanical and Aeronautical Engineering from Instituto Tecnolѓgico de Aeronсtica - ITA (2011). He is currently a Senior Technologist of the National Institute for Space Research (INPE) - Quality Assurance Manager - Assembly, Integration and Test of satellites at Assembly and Test Laboratory (LIT). Acting on the following topics: Development of integrated space systems, Design and Development of Satellite, Satellite Assembly, Integration and Test (AIT) and Quality Assurance for AIT.
